main.docTitle: Water Pollution Control (North Western Water Control Zone) Order

section.name: s1
section.heading: Citation
section.content: This Order may be cited as the Water Pollution Control (North Western Water Control Zone) Order.

section.name: s2
section.heading: Declaration of North Western Water Control Zone
section.content: That part of Hong Kong described in the Schedule is declared to be a water control zone for the purposes of the Ordinance, and is to be known as the North Western Water Control Zone.

section.name: s3
section.heading: Designation of Authority
section.content: The Director of Environmental Protection is designated as the Authority for the North Western Water Control Zone.

schedule.name: sch0
schedule.content: The area of Hong Kong bounded by grey edging on a series of maps of the scale of 1:20 000 marked NWWCZ 1, NWWCZ 2, NWWCZ 3, NWWCZ 4 and NWWCZ 5 described as “North Western Water Control Zone” signed by the Secretary for Planning, Environment and Lands on 6 November 1991, and deposited in the Land Registry.
